title: Android 10 - Low Battery Warning not working
content:
Since the Android 10 update, my Pixel 3 as well as my housemate's Pixel 2XL do not give out a "Low Battery" warning anymore. I've checked the notification settings on both phones. Battery alerts are turned on.

I already sent feedback but, just in case, am I missing something?. I checked under SETTINGS -> APPS & NOTIFICATION -> ALL APPS -> SYSTEM UI -> BATTERY
